title: Create TaskCard Component
description: Build a TaskCard component that displays task information with priority-based styling.
instructions:
Create a TaskCard component that:
1. Displays task title, status, priority, and due date
2. Shows different background colors based on priority (URGENT=red, HIGH=orange, MEDIUM=yellow, LOW=green)
3. Shows overdue indicator if due date is in the past and task is not completed
4. Has Edit and Delete buttons that call the provided callbacks

hints.text: Use an object to map priority values to Tailwind CSS classes for colors.
Compare task.dueDate with new Date() to determine if overdue. Check task.status !== 'COMPLETED' to exclude completed tasks.
